tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: ** ** **** **** ********with all reports negative i had high grade fever for more than 5 days..luckily my file was moved to Mr.Manjunath since other doctors who were treating me were on leave, the day Dr.Manjunath started his treatment i started feeling better in next two days i got discharged from Malathi Manipal Hospital..i felt like God treated me..very professional..he enters hospital between 6A.M to 6.05 A.M( inpatient visit) without fail..very friendly and a great human being..!!!

After my initial consultation, the results were up to the mark. The doctor was approachable and also descriptive about the health condition. I am supposed to consult him again for the follow-up. For now, it is all going fine. I will surely recommend the doctor.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Dr. Manjunath is very unprofessional in his approach, *** **** ***** ***** ******* *** ******* ********* ******** ** ****** *** ***** * ******* *** *** ***** ** **** ****** ********* *** ** **** ******* ***** ** ********* In my case (viral fever), ** ***** *** *** ** ***** ********* *** ****** asked me to undergo test for malaria, dengue, CBC, LFT, Blood Culture. In addition, he prescribed the most costliest medicines to me for treating viral fever. For getting my viral cured from him, I had to shell out a whopping amount of 7K! I would not recommend Dr. Manjunath.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: I never recommend this doctor to anyone. He and his assistant both are very rude and there is no patience to listen to the problem.My father used to get unconscious all of a sudden when i checked by nearby hospital around night 3am doctor said ecg looks abnormal please contact someone expert. In this situation i found a ******** ******** ****** doctor manjunath.At first manjunath dint not allow me to speak n explain what is the health condition of my father and what all happened so far, doctor wanted my father to explain whats the problem. How can a person who is falling unconscious can explain what has happened to him ?Second he did ecg which was normal and asked for MRI of brain and spaine from some ****** diagnostic center saying actually it will cost 10 for MRI if i go with this doctor they will do the contrast for free. But i got the MRI reports done from a reputed lab *** **** ** *** ***** **** ****** ******* As soon as he saw the report from another lab he got irritated and behaved very badly saying he can't trust this report.At last after all these backnforth no treatment no conclusion nothing gave a piece of paper with how to do surya namaskara on it and asked to do everyday. NO TŔÈTMÈŃT at all.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Doctor was in hurry , may b he was overwhelmed with the number of patients in the queue. We had to wait for more that 30 mins. Based on the symptoms he suggested medication which did not help. He suggested to take RTPCR test and never asked to visit.. my wife and I tested on 30th April. Next day on 1st my wife’s report was sent to me via email and I did not receive my report.. I had to call the number mentioned in the email 20 times and I was transferred from one line to the other.. I was asked to collect it physically despite being positive.. next day had to rush my wife as she has discomfort in her stomach.. we at emergency  ward was made to Aga Ian wait for 30 mins.stating Manjunath was in rounds he will come n he never turned up. I had to request the doc in emergency to attend my wife and then he treated her. She was given some injections in the saline. post that we were asked to pay or else saline needle will not be removed .. I was asked to go to billing counter to pay and there were hardly anyone on the front desk.. I had to request to take the bills.. I wasn’t explained about what the charges were all about and was asked to pay approx  4300 I was already feeling restless coz of being distressed and tired.. this is not the way you treat a patient who comes with lot of hope.. I wouldn’t recommend Manipal hospital ever.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: My wife was having heart burn issue . Doctor met only for 2 minutes and prescribed medicine without any explanation. When I asked in case she feel increased heart beat what to do, ** **** **** **** **** ** **** ********* * ****** ******** **** ** ******* *** ********** ******** ** *** *** ***** ****** ***** *** *** *** ******* ** ****  He told to get ECG if we want and show the report to the lab person only -irresponsible behaviour very bad experience would not recommend any one .

I went for fever treatment he told me to get admitted without giving me proper medication just by seeing report asked me to go for admission. I was not satisfied with the explanation I left *** *** ******* ******* * *** ********* **** ***** ** *******

From serviceable amenities to well connected staffing, everything is beyond excellence. I am visiting Dr. R Manjunath from past two months. He is a nice and approachable person who explains everything in a detailed manner. His treatment have successfully produced the desired result. I am very happy with the entire experience.

*** ****** *** **** ***** ** ******** * **** ********* *** **. As soon as I visited the hospital, I was able to meet the doctor. Literally no waiting period was noted. Since I was suspected of dengue fever, only blood test was suggested. I am satisfied with the overall outcome.

Since my mother got admitted over there, I am consulting this doctor and it's been almost four months now. ** ** * **** **** ******* His treatment was ********* *** *** satisfied me greatly. The standard waiting period will be around 15 minutes most of the times.

tags: Wait time,Value for money,Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,
review: This doctor in  first appointment gave me medicines ***** *** ** *******2nd Appointment he  told me get endoscopy done for general womiting and nausea endoscopy 8000.3rd appointment told me to get CT scan done for entire body which costs around 18000 in Dr malathi Manipal hospital. 4th appointment again he told me get EGC done and one other checkup for heart which cost around 5000. But there was no improvement. I was new in Bangalore that's why I visited my nearest hospital and this doctor know nothing. He told me that I got serious illness which has no cure. * ******* ***** ******** *** ** ***** *********** ** *** ******* ***** * ***** *** **** ****** **  **** ****** ** ******* *** ******* ********* ******** ******* ********

I had breathing difficulty, not that severe though. When I consulted him, he didn't examine me personally but only asked about my lifestyle and previous medical history. Based on that, he suggested some tests and medicines. May be due to corona scarcity, he might have avoided the practical examination. The staff was very cooperative. It took only 5 minutes for X-ray. When I took the reports, the doctor was already left. I was redirected to visit after one week. I neither visit again nor took those medications. The reason was that, I am not a nonsmoker but I smoke occasionally. I have mentioned it when he asked. But in prescription, it was mentioned that I smoke on a regular basis. So it made me confused about whether those medicines were suitable or not. I didn't get a chance to solve my doubts as he was already left.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: This was the first time we visited Dr Manjunath and certainly the last. The patient was a senior citizen and we went to him to show some skin rash. ******* ******* **** ****** **** ** *** ** ******* ********* *** Second he was very impatient and was not interested in hearing us out. As a senior citizen one generally tend to have a few age related ailments But he was in no mood to listen.  But just after a couple of basic questions he was done with his diagnosis. When my mother tried to explain to him and clarify what medication he prescribed he actually snapped back at her. We were quiet shocked at this rudeness and frankly don't expect a Dr of his seniority to be so impatient. In all we only spent about 6-7 hurried mins in with the Dr. I DO NOT recommend him.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Visited the doctor for * ****** fever, he ended our session asserting that it was a case of Dengue. *** ********** **** ***** ** *** ********* **** ** *** * ****** *** ********** I had my blood tested later at a diagnostics centre****** ** ****** *** *** * **** ** *** ************* and found that everything including the haemoglobin and the platelet count was normal. ** **** ****** ** ******* *** ******** *** ******* ** **** ***** ** ********* We are extremely dissatisfied and nevertheless, furious.

I had frequent neck pain, Doctor did diagnosis and prescribed calcium and vitamin supplements to strengthen bones. After taking the supplements and following the suggested diet, I am now free of neck pain.

Well aware of thyroid disorders and gave proportional dose to cure step by step.
Provide information about thyroid disorders and good in consultation.

He is a great doctor. We have always visited him for my mother. She always insists on going to him every time she is unwell. His medication has worked out for her. If the patient is residing far from the hospital he is available on the phone too.
Good doctor. Always hears very patiently to patients problems and diagnose with good medication. He has become our family physician.
Doctor is listen's our problem and give proper advice. Gives moral support when admitted in hospital. Thanks sir.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Doctor friendliness,Value for money,Explanation of the health issue,
review:
My brother got high fever and had body pains, doctor recommended to go for abdominal scan ***** *** *** ********* *** keeps on referring to get admitted in the hospital instead of prescribing medicine.
Just for getting the advice to eat dolo 650 we have been visited the doctor 😖

The consultation was absolutely satisfying. The doctor gave me a nice approach and discussed the issues very well. He didn't insist to take any tests. But the prescribed medicines were effective. I am very happy with the results.
I am consulting him for a couple of years now. I am always happy with his treatment. He is definitely recommended.

The consultation was all good with minimum waiting period *** ********* ********** I got complete recovery in just two days. I am happy with everything and I recommend the doctor with great satisfaction.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: I am extremely happy with the doctor's behaviour and the way he treats the patient. He listened my problem carefully and then assured me not to worry about my health.Seeing the report he diagnosed me and gave me some medicine of Allergy.
doctor manjunath was patient and has provided apt medication to relieve sinus symptoms. quiet satisfied

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: I had 2 bad experience with the doctor. In my case I visited for Allergy Reaction. He said it is normal in bagalore & gave No Worm tablet. that is all. I did somewhere my test & found i am alergic to Gluten. 2nd incident for my brother who was undergoing treatment at malalli manipal. Every morning 7am he comes & visits. Don't even see the report & just use some abusive words & charging 1700 fees. No treatment. * ***** ** **** *** ********* ** ******** So rude.

I consulted him for my baby as she suffered from a certain skin disease. For consultation only we waited for more than 2 and a half hours. The queue itself took a long way to reach the doctor. He was good at explaining. He did it all well with the diagnosis *** *** ********* ** ********** *** *** ********* ******. We were foreseeing a quick recovery. But the results were not put up the same when compared to the cost, time and efforts spent on it.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,

review:
Doctor is definitely very experienced, but he is a bit all over the place & slightly rushed. Would be good if he can patiently listen to our side of things then jump to giving suggestions. Our 1st appointment with him was his last one for the day & doctor was in such a hurry to pack up. 
However his process & suggestions were fine. Fee is slightly expensive compared to the actual consultation time.

He did not examined me thoroughly. After checking the heart rate, I was given some medications that too was very expensive one. Also I was charged separately for registration and consultation which seemed too pricey for what I have received in the form of treatment. So I am not very satisfied with the experience.

I am extremely happy with Dr. R Manjunath. The treatment given to me has successfully resulted in the expected outcome. The waiting time may not be more than 30 minutes. The only complaint about the hospital was that I was admitted there for a certain period and I visited again for the review consultation. But they charge me the same amount for that as well. I think that they should consider a discount on that.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Doctor  can be a but more polite towards his approach of treatment. He straight  away refused to consider the reports which i had already done due to my months of illness . He wanted every test to be done at Manipal Hospital ***** ******* ******* *** **** ** **** ***** ********* ****** **** ********  ******* ** *******

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Not friendly or encouraging. He scared my brother that he would get chicken pox too and wanted to hospitalize for no appropriate reason

**** *** **** ******* ********* **** **** ****** A one stop shop for all our family Illnesses.
Way to go Dr.Manjunath.
Doctor keenly listened to my problem, Reviewed my previous visit problem, listened to my current problem,
Didn't explain what is worng and which medication is for what.  My major concern was headache and it is still there.
****** ********* ** *** **** *********he is excellent in the field of medicine and is very much approachable for any queries about medical treatment.

The doctor was calm and was explaining everything.he heard out all the health issues I was having and reconfirmed it by asking again etc.overall the doctor and the nurse was responsive and did everything keeping in mind the sense of hygiene.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: We have known the Dr since 2010 and for any health issue, invariably consult him for his knowledge, patience and the manner in which he approaches the issue.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,
review: The best thing about him was his friendly behaviour. He makes the patient at ease . He also never suggested some unnecessary test and all
